text: was a Japanese actor. He was best known for his roles as Nyarome in Mōretsu Atarō, Daisho in Himitsu no Akko-chan, Boss in Mazinger Z, Pāman 2 (Booby) in Pāman, King Nikochan in Dr. Slump, and Buta Gorilla in Kiteretsu Daihyakka. Ōtake died on August 1, 2022 from heart failure at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Japanese voice actors Category:Japanese television actors Category:Japanese movie actors
title: Hiroshi Ōtake
